articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: TikTok users freak out over app’s ‘immigration status’ collection — here’s what it means - TechCrunch
articles.description: TikTok users are freaking out over a mention of "immigration status" data collection, but lawyers explain the disclosure is related to state privacy laws.
articles.content: With the change in TikTok ownership, TikTok users in the U.S. are collectively freaking out over the company’s updated privacy policy after being alerted to the changes through an in-app message. The… [+8136 chars]
